reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: INT/European Centre for Development Policy Managment,phase II

description.narrative: Finland supports ECDPM with core funding of 225 000/year for the years 2013-2015. In addition ECDPM is requested to provide training and/or seminars for the MFA in yearly bases (25 000/year). The European Centre for Development Policy Management (ECDPM) i s an independent foundation created in 1986 with a view to strenghtening capacities in the ACP/Africa and improving relations between the EU and ACP/African countries. ECPDM produces independent and practical analysis advice and information and facilitates strategic policy processes and offers training. Finland has supported ECDPM since 1998.
